items.rawContent:
{
    "id": "gs.StartTimer",
    "group": "$$2DCE5AEAK657FA4F5BS8EC3EA543DC123D24",
    "displayName": "$$347748495F15D1438B88AD5881A3511EFA18",
    "subGroup": "$$F891A99C6C33364D583BBBA74E1CB73F0BAE",
    "defaultValue": { "number": 0, "interval": 60, "action": { "type": 0, "data": { "label": "", "commonEventId": 0 } } },
    "quickItems": [
        {
            "type": "GSQStepper",
            "variableButton": true,
            "label": "$$C287D490K9B01A4407SA616EF2726CA43B52",
            "attribute": "number"
        },
        {
            "type": "GSQStepper",
            "label": "$$8B7BC43319CE884D1E7AA7A53C2CD04D4EE7",
            "variableButton": true,
            "valueFormula": "return fmtDuration(fmtNumVar(p.interval))",
            "valueTranslator": { "read": "return ROUND(v / GS.CONST.GAME_FRAME_RATE * 1000)", "write": "return v / 1000 * GS.CONST.GAME_FRAME_RATE" },
            "attribute": "interval"
        },
        {
            "type": "GSQPopupField",
            "identifier": "actionType",
            "label": "$$9007510B517ED342E52BE962B794DB75CA2D",
            "valueFormula": "return GS.CONST.ACTION_TYPES[p.action.type]",
            "dataSource": GS.CONST.ACTION_TYPES,
            "attribute": "action.type",
            "showItems": [["label"], ["commonEventId"]]
        },
        {
            "type": "GSQTextArea",
            "identifier": "label",
            "multiline": false,
            "label": "$$DE90FBDDKDCE8A4CAASA1C1E982F7D417C1C",
            "valueFormula": "return p.action.data.label || lcs('C50EA7EF0592134BEF59E098BD7961D34EB4')",
            "attribute": "action.data.label"
        },
        {
            "type": "GSQDataRecordField",
            "identifier": "commonEventId",
            "valueFormula": "return fmtRecord('commonEvents', p.action.data.commonEventId)",
            "label": "$$512615ADK2682A417AS9B11EF5FDFE78FD82",
            "dataSource": "commonEvents",
            "attribute": "action.data.commonEventId"
        }
    ]
}
items.name: Start Timer
